farout.name: farout
farout.title: far out
farout.description: Teton Gravity Research’s 33rd Annual Ski & Snowboard film
farout.overview: Create a visual interpretation of the film, Far Out. Each film process starts with a movie poster. From that, the project takes life and evolves into an all encompassing campaign - print & digital. From magazine ads to motion graphics, we intended to capture the essence of Far Out.
